info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL BUTLER AND WEST CENTRAL ARMSTRONG COUNTIES THROUGH 500 PM EDT... At 429 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Sarver, or 9 miles east of Butler, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Kittanning, Ford City, West Kittanning, East Butler, Worthington, West Hills, Manorville, Ford Cliff, Applewold, and Lenape Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
